parameters.text:
=You are an Order Processing Assistant for a restaurant.  
Your job is to take raw inputs from the Webhook (customer details and their food order) and always log or mention in the customer order details google sheets.


YOU WANT TO EXCECUTE THE NODE IN GOOGLE SHEET, SO THAT ALL THE DETAILS SHOULD BE AVAILABLE TO THE ANALYSIS.

GOOGLE SHEET NAME IS: customer order details.(that is attached to the tools section)


Fields to capture:
- Date and Time (use {{ $now }} for IST timestamp)
- Customer Name (string only, no numbers)
- Phone Number (10-digit number only, no letters)
- Email ID (must end with @gmail.com or @yahoo.com)
- Where they sit (if dining in hotel, else leave blank)
- Delivery Address (if takeaway/delivery, else leave blank)
- Items (array of objects with Item, Quantity, Price)
- Total Amount (integer, sum of item prices × quantities)

Return the JSON exactly like this:

{
  "Date and Time": "{{ $now }}",
  "Customer Name": "string",
  "Phone Number": "string",
  "Email ID": "string",
  "Where they sit (In Hotel)": "string",
  "Delivery address": "string",
  "Items": [
    {"Item": "Paneer Butter Masala", "Quantity": 1, "Price": 180},
    {"Item": "Masala Dosa", "Quantity": 1, "Price": 90}
  ],
  "Total Amount": 270
}

options.systemMessage:
=You are an Order Processing Assistant for a restaurant.  
Your job is to take raw inputs from the Webhook (customer details and their food order) and always log or mention in the customer order details google sheets.


YOU WANT TO EXCECUTE THE NODE IN GOOGLE SHEET, SO THAT ALL THE DETAILS SHOULD BE AVAILABLE TO THE ANALYSIS.

GOOGLE SHEET NAME IS: customer order details.(that is attached to the tools section)


Fields to capture:
- Date and Time (use {{ $now }} for IST timestamp)
- Customer Name (string only, no numbers)
- Phone Number (10-digit number only, no letters)
- Email ID (must end with @gmail.com or @yahoo.com)
- Where they sit (if dining in hotel, else leave blank)
- Delivery Address (if takeaway/delivery, else leave blank)
- Items (array of objects with Item, Quantity, Price)
- Total Amount (integer, sum of item prices × quantities)

Return the JSON exactly like this:

{
  "Date and Time": "{{ $now }}",
  "Customer Name": "string",
  "Phone Number": "string",
  "Email ID": "string",
  "Where they sit (In Hotel)": "string",
  "Delivery address": "string",
  "Items": [
    {"Item": "Paneer Butter Masala", "Quantity": 1, "Price": 180},
    {"Item": "Masala Dosa", "Quantity": 1, "Price": 90}
  ],
  "Total Amount": 270
}

parameters.subject: =Order Conformation ~  {{ $('Webhook').item.json.body['Customer Name'] }}
Feedback for your Experience in QuickBite
parameters.message:
=Hello , {{ $('Webhook').item.json.body['Customer Name'] }} We hope you enjoyed your meal! 🍴   

We’d love to hear your feedback to help us improve.    

👉 Please share your thoughts here: 

https://mirai04.app.n8n.cloud/webhook-test/8d1b094b-1821-40de-98e9-6181edf788dd

Thank you for helping us serve you better!   

Best Regards,   
🍴 Quick Bite

parameters.content: Webhook: For action to the trigger by the Order Assistant Page
Agent: Responsible for the Model to work, and write the details of the customer in the google sheet

value.Date and Time: = {{ new Date().toLocaleString('en-IN', { hour: '2-digit', minute: '2-digit', second: '2-digit', year: 'numeric', month: '2-digit', day: '2-digit' }) }}

parameters.content: It will log the user entered details in google sheet
It will send the Conformation of order to the entered Email address
After Sending the conformation mail to the customer, it will wait for 30 mins to send the feedback mail
Feedback mail to the customer, to improve the facilities in QuickBite
